com.oculusinfo.ml.spark

Class SparkDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oculusinfo.ml.DataSet
      • com.oculusinfo.ml.spark.SparkDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<com.oculusinfo.ml.Instance>

    public class SparkDataSet
extends com.oculusinfo.ml.DataSet
    This class represents a structured collection of data Instances that is backed by a Spark RDD.
    Author:
    slangevin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SparkDataSet(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc)
      The constructor must be passed a Spark Context used to communicate with the Spark installation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext getContext()
      Return the Spark context this DataSet is bound to

      Return the underlying Spark RDD containing hte DataSet Instances
      void load(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<String,com.oculusinfo.ml.Instance> rdd)
      The SparkDataSet can be directly provided a pre-defined RDD of Instances
      void load(String path, SparkInstanceParser parser)
      The SparkDataSet loads data using this method to populate the DataSet with Instances.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(String path,
        SparkInstanceParser parser,
        int minSplits)
        The SparkDataSet loads data using this method to populate the DataSet with Instances.
        Parameters:
        path - the location of the data to load (filesystem or HDFS path)
        parser - is the object that converts each line in the data into an Instance
        minSplits - determine the number of Spark partitions to split the data into

      • load

        public void load(String path,
        SparkInstanceParser parser)
        The SparkDataSet loads data using this method to populate the DataSet with Instances.
        Parameters:
        path - the location of the data to load (filesystem or HDFS path)
        parser - is the object that converts each line in the data into an Instance

      • load

        public void load(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<String,com.oculusinfo.ml.Instance> rdd)
        The SparkDataSet can be directly provided a pre-defined RDD of Instances
        Parameters:
        rdd - the RDD of Instances
